name: West Fraser Timber Co. Ltd.
description: West Fraser Timber Co. Ltd. is a leading North American wood products producer and one of the largest lumber producers in the world. Founded in 1955 and headquartered in Vancouver, Canada, West Fraser is committed to responsible forest management, sustainable practices, and producing high-quality wood products. The company operates numerous sawmills and manufacturing facilities across Canada and the United States, specializing in lumber, engineered wood products, and other value-added wood products. With a strong focus on innovation and efficiency, West Fraser invests in advanced technologies and processes to ensure the highest standards of quality and environmental stewardship. The company's diverse product portfolio includes structural lumber, plywood, oriented strand board (OSB), and specialty wood products, serving various markets including residential, commercial, and industrial sectors. West Fraser's commitment to sustainability is reflected in its practices, which aim to minimize environmental impact and promote reforestation. The company is also actively involved in community engagement and supports various initiatives that benefit local economies and ecosystems. By prioritizing sustainability, quality, and customer service, West Fraser continues to build a solid reputation as a trusted partner in the wood products industry, contributing to the global demand for sustainable building materials.

seo.meta_title: West Fraser Timber Co. Ltd. | Leading Wood Products Producer
seo.meta_description: Discover West Fraser Timber Co. Ltd., a top producer of lumber and engineered wood products, committed to sustainability and quality in forestry.

faq.question: What does West Fraser do?
faq.answer: West Fraser is a leading producer of lumber, engineered wood products, and specialty wood products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of West Fraser?
faq.answer: Ray Ferris is the CEO of West Fraser Timber Co. Ltd.

faq.question: Where is West Fraser headquartered?
faq.answer: West Fraser is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada.

faq.question: What are West Fraser's main products?
faq.answer: West Fraser's main products include structural lumber, plywood, oriented strand board (OSB), and engineered wood products.
